detectors.description: Contract cybernetchain (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#42-99) is not in CapWords
Variable cybernetchain._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#47) is not in mixedCase

cybernetchain.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#57-65) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 21000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#61)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- cybernetchain.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#67-69)
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#8)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- cybernetchain.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#71-73)
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#9)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#10)
	- cybernetchain.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#75-77)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#11)
	- cybernetchain.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#85-90)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- cybernetchain.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#79-83)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#12)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#31-35)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/cybernetchain.sol#35-38)
